name: Dead End Job (itch) (Dragon Theory Games)
description:
Congratulations! You are the proud new owner of a convenience store at the edge of the world! 

Every ten seconds, bus loads of monster denizens arrive to shop 'til someone drops. Manage multiple displays and facilities to keep up with customer demand, earning money and buying upgrades. The more successful your store, the more customers will frequent the shop. 

Read the in-game employee handbook, turn on the sign, and begin your exciting journey into U-Shop franchise ownership! Stock candy, soda machines, ice cream, and keep the bathrooms clean. Check customers out when they're ready. If you take too long to restock or check them out, customers will be upset, causing satisfaction ratings to fall and the store to close!

Please make full-screen for the best experience.

Play Notes:

- Please make full-screen for the best experience.

- Restock the two bathrooms by clicking on the dark doors in the shop.
